content.description: The following question is based on the first phrase of a piano sonata in common time. The phrase consists of four measures starting with a one-beat pick-up of four sixteenth notes.
content.question: What type of nonharmonic tone is used on beat 1 of measure 1 ?

unit.text: 6: Harmony and Voice Leading III - Embellishments, Motives, and Melodic Devices

topic.text: 6.1: Embellishing Tones - Identifying Passing Tones and Neighbor Tones

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
